title: CNBC Recruitment 2026 - Apply for Various Radiologist Posts
description: Chacha Nehru Bal Chikitsalaya (CNBC) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Radiologist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS and DNB can grab this chance and apply for the CNBC Recruitment 2026 . Here we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date.
